cohort.description: The pursuit of pleasure is the meaning of existence.
Humanity should be elevated through bionic augmentation. Everlasting life can be found through technology.
The universe is a computer simulation that can be broken if everyone... does something that's a bit unclear.
The impending apocalypse will only spare the dedicated, who will transcend their bodies to become immortal spirits.
Humanity exists in an inevitable cycle of prosperity and ruin, and they seek to hasten the next cycle.
The primordial darkness that once covered the planet is its natural state. Earth's atmosphere should be shifted to resemble Venus by any means possible.
Technology is a plague upon the race, and humanity should be returned to a pre-industrial existence.
Obedience to authority should be absolute and blind.
Founder Dyeni, who is said to be 207 years old, is the living embodiment of morality. The chosen can do no wrong other than defying the other chosen.
The enigmatic nine founders have laid down a series of nine steps to transcendence, each step only revealed to those who prove their dedication with a significant financial contribution.
